author: JJ Nattrass
title: Lady Victoria Hervey is virtually naked as she shows off nipple pasties in totally sheer gown
text:
Celebs Lady Victoria Hervey is virtually naked as she shows off nipple pasties in totally sheer gown The socialite showed plenty of skin, but managed to spare herself some blushes thanks to a pair of knickers and nipple pasties Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She's no stranger to making an eye-catching entrance at an event - having been one of the nation's most prominent 'It Girls' back in the nineties. 
So it was little surprise to see Lady Victoria Hervey stepping out in a typically racy ensemble, nearly daring to bare all, at the Bitter Harvest gala screening in London, on Monday night. 
Arriving at the Ham Yard Hotel in Soho, the 40-year-old reality star and socialite made a head-turning arrival as she sashayed up the red carpet in a sheer black, floor-length gown. Read More Lady Victoria Hervey accidentally flashes knickers in VERY revealing leg-bombing dress on Cannes red carpet Sheer sass! (Photo: WireImage) 
Attending the screening of George Mendeluk's latest film, Victoria opted for a seriously saucy twist on red carpet fashion. 
Slipping her lithe and gym-honed figure into a sheer black formal dress, the one-time The Jump contestant left little to the imagination. 
Featuring black banded capped sleeves, a high neckline and a trail, the dress would have been blended quite seamlessly into the crowd - save for its see-through nature and gold sequined detailing. Read More The Jump fans suspicious as injured Bradley Wiggins competes AFTER pulling out - but there's an explanation Lady Victoria Hervey left little to the imagination at the Bitter Harvest gala screening on Monday night (Photo: WireImage) 
Showcasing nearly every inch of her enviable figure, the former model spared her modesty thanks to a pair of tiny black knickers and a pair of nude nipple pasties. 
Victoria teamed her frock with a red carpet classic, opting for a towering pair of black stiletto heeels. 
Keen to not pull focus from her eye-catching gown, she kept her accessories to a smattering of bling, wearing a pair of dangling bejewelled earrings and a sparkling silver watch. The socialite, 40, spared herself any blushes by wearing nipple pasties and a pair of black knickers (Photo: WireImage) 
Wearing her long blonde locks swept over to one side, in a cascade of golden waves, the blue blooded aristocrat ensured her striking features were firmly in the lime light. 
She accentuated her pretty features with a bronzed palette of make-up and a flash of heavy black eyeliner. 
Victoria was one of the more notable faces to attend the gala alongside the film's stars, Max Irons, Samantha Barks and Tamer Hassan. Read More
